channel.title: Planning on Jovial Dragon blog
channel.description: Recent content in Planning on Jovial Dragon blog

item.title: To talk of many things
item.description: Blogs. They’re the in thing these days. Nuff said. With any luck this blog will be a vehicle to chronicle my adventures and whatever happens in between. Or I’ll get lazy and the last thing you’ll know is I am lost in a jungle. Never to be heard from again. Lately I’m been doing much planning for my upcoming trip to India. Booking travel insurance isn’t very fun. I do however have a list of much less fun things:
